Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the poster was put up by Aligarh Muslim University students, when in fact it was part of a protest in London.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false claim shared on social media without any evidence or verification.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the poster represents the views of Aligarh Muslim University students, which is not supported by any evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the poster was not featured in any part of the country and was actually a part of a protest in London.
Alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the poster was not put up by AMU students, but was used as a part of a protest against the revocation of Article 370 in London.
